metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9244 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Keys of objects in mysql node module v2.0.0-alpha7 and earlier are not escaped with `mysql.escape()` which could lead to SQL Injection.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9244` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-mysql - 2.0.0~alpha8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-mysql package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0~alpha8-1').
